mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction (tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, dlvy_addr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date) VALUES (seq_transaction_tran_no.NEXTVAL, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, #{buyer.userId}, #{paymentOption}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{dlvyAddr}, #{dlvyRequest}, 0, SYSDATE, to_date(#{dlvyDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, dlvy_addr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date FROM transaction WHERE tran_no = #{value}
SELECT tran_no FROM transaction WHERE prod_no = #{prod_no}
mapper.sql: SELECT t.tran_no, t.prod_no, t.buyer_id, t.payment_option, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.dlvy_addr, t.dlvy_request, t.tran_status_code, t.order_date, t.dlvy_date FROM transaction t LEFT JOIN product p ON t.prod_no = p.prod_no WHERE t.buyer_id = #{buyer.userId}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM (
ORDER BY t.tran_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT tran_no FROM transaction ) countTable
